name: Master of Mushrooms
description:
Use tools and information to identify mushrooms!

How to play
Click on basket to get next mushroom. Identify mushroom using available tools and book. Select correct mushroom from book. Get next mushroom.

Left click on tool / mushroom: Pick up
Right click: Put down item in hand
Right click on mushroom (not in hand): Inspect
WASD: Rotate mushroom in hand
T: Switch camera view
